General.Name: Surface Transforms Plc
General.Description: Surface Transforms Plc, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells carbon ceramic products for the brakes market in the United Kingdom, Germany, Sweden, rest of Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers carbon-ceramic brake discs for automotive and aircraft applications. It also provides carbon-ceramic materials for various applications, such as motorsports, military, and other special vehicles. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Liverpool, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Image Business Park, Liverpool, United Kingdom, L33 7UF
